property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: Indicates the category of a topic or theme to further group content.

property.name: headline
property.label: Headline
property.description: Provides a snapshot of the content combined with a URL the items leads to in Markdown link format.

property.name: copy
property.label: Copy
property.description: Provides further details where the headline alone may not be sufficient - in Markdown format.
property.default: Use list items to display a list of results to users surfacing key information.

property.name: date
property.label: Date
property.description: Specifies a date context for the content, e.g. a publication date - in ISO8601 format.

property.name: dateStyle
property.label: Date style
property.description: Styling to be applie to the date.

property.name: image
property.label: Image source
property.description: Allows for different content to stand out and provide additional context - as an URL.

property.name: imageAlt
property.label: Image alt
property.description: Specifies an alternate text for the image used if the image cannot be displayed.

property.name: tags
property.label: Tags
property.description: Tags in Markdown URL format to further group content.

property.name: showLink
property.label: Show link
property.description: Indicates that the link information should be displayed.

property.name: isBlock
property.label: Is block
property.description: The link applies to the whole list item vs. only the headline.

property.name: isReversed
property.label: Is reversed
property.description: The image, if any, should be displayed on the left hand side.

property.name: className
property.label: Additional classes
property.description: Additional CSS classes to be applied.
